AI Website Builders for Nonprofits

Best AI website builders for nonprofit organizations and charities. Affordable options with donation tools, volunteer management, and mission-focused templates.

Quick Recommendations

Webflow (8.6/10) - 50% nonprofit discount: Best for nonprofits with design resources. Code export means you own your site.

Wix (8.2/10) - 50% nonprofit discount: Most features and templates. Easiest donation setup.

Mixo (8.5/10) - $9/month: Best budget option. Fast setup, good templates, no discount needed.

Durable (8.5/10) - $15/month: Best for donor management. Built-in CRM is perfect for nonprofits.

Nonprofit Builder Comparison

Builder Score Price Nonprofit Discount Best For
Wix 8.2/10 From $16/mo (50% nonprofit discount available) No Most features and templates
Squarespace 8.4/10 From $23/mo No Professional design
Durable 8.5/10 From $15/mo No Quick setup + CRM
Mixo 8.5/10 From $9/mo No Budget-friendly + fast
Webflow 8.6/10 From $23/mo (50% nonprofit discount) No Design flexibility

What Nonprofits Need in a Website Builder

Essential Features

  • ● Donation Processing: Easy online donations with multiple payment options
  • ● Volunteer Management: Forms and tools for volunteer recruitment
  • ● Event Management: Calendar, registration, and event promotion tools
  • ● Storytelling: Blog, photo galleries, and impact showcases
  • ● Contact/Communication: Newsletters, contact forms, social integration

Nice-to-Have Features

  • ○ Donor Database: Built-in CRM for donor tracking
  • ○ Recurring Donations: Monthly giving options
  • ○ Peer-to-Peer Fundraising: Campaign pages for supporters
  • ○ Membership Management: Member directories and portals
  • ○ Grant Management: Tracking and reporting tools

Tips for Nonprofit Websites

  • Always ask for nonprofit discounts: Many builders don't advertise them but will offer 30-50% off if asked
  • Check TechSoup: TechSoup.org offers deeply discounted software for qualifying nonprofits
  • Keep it simple: Focus on donations, storytelling, and volunteer recruitment. Don't overcomplicate
  • Mobile-first: Many donors will view your site on mobile. Ensure mobile optimization
  • Clear donation button: Make donating obvious and easy. Above the fold on every page
  • Tell impact stories: Show how donations help. Photos, videos, and testimonials build trust

All builders offer free trials. Test donation setups before committing.
